page.title: 20Annual Events
page.content: Societies are well represented in Clevedon. The Rotary Club,Lions International and Round Table all raise money for charity. Clevedon Carnival is organised by the Lions.A Carnival Queen and two Princesses are chosen(at a disco)to lead the procession.Other contributions come from local residents ,schools,societies and works groups e.g. Cam Gears.Prizes are given to the best floats. A Ten Mile Run is sponsored by the Lions and Clevedon Athletic Club. Anyone can take part and there are prizes for the winners.The course is around Kingston Seymour. Each year a travelling fair comes to the Salthouse Fields.There are various rides(Ferris Wheel and dodgems),stalls and sideshows.(compiled by Clevedon Comprehensive School)
